entry.title: Ex-Autonomy CFO Sushovan Hussain was accused of sexual misconduct against Darktrace staff – report
entry.summary:
Security biz says it was a long time ago and he didn't technically work for them anyway

Former Autonomy chief financial officer Sushovan Hussain was alleged to be involved in two #MeToo-style incidents while he was working for Mike Lynch's Darktrace infosec biz.…

entry.title: Come to Five Guys, where the software is as fresh as the burgers... or maybe not
entry.summary:
French terminal flashes sous-vêtements at Paris patty punters

Bork!Bork!Bork!  Welcome to another instalment in our occasional series of software being poorly where it really shouldn't. Today it is Five Guys, where the burgers are fresh, but the software less so……
